segments.text: Looking at this scene, the woman's completely absorbed in drying that dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet's running full blast, and the sink is full to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's cascading over the edge, soaking the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not hear it or feel the wet floor?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are up to no good, raiding the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy's on a shaky stool, stretching way too high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and he'll tumble down into the puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's just waiting, hand out like it's no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole setup is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked neatly on the counter, but everything's about to get ruined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window shows a nice garden, but inside it's a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe they're all so oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to yell and stop this now.
segments.speaker: PAR
